rooms.description: A welcoming entrance hall with minimal decor and natural light. Adheres to Vastu principles by aligning the main door towards north.
A spacious living room with east facing windows, ensuring natural morning light and a vibrant atmosphere. The design includes comfortable seating area and ambient lighting.
Modern kitchen with south-facing windows providing ample natural light, efficient workflow, and storage solutions. Includes a ventilation hood aligning with Vastu guidelines.
A compact dining area integrated with the living room or adjacent to kitchen. Uses west-facing window for natural light while ensuring balance per Vastu.
Sleek and airy bedroom with south facing windows to promote comfort. Includes built-in storage and a small balcony for fresh air.
Functional bathroom located conveniently near the bedroom. North facing window ensures natural light and ventilation.
Cozy library with east-facing windows providing optimal morning light conducive to reading and studying. Furnishings include shelves and comfortable seating.

openings.description: Main entrance door designed with Vastu recommendations emphasizing the north direction.
Side windows ensuring natural ventilation while following Vastu guidelines for light distribution.
